Package com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller

Class HomeMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller.HomeMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class HomeMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
This class is extracted from HomeMenu of the original code and modified along with having additions.
This class is the controller class for HomeMenu.
This class defines the actions to be performed when HomeMenu options are clicked.
It calls the ViewManager.enableGameBoard().
It reads and displays sortedHighScoresList.txt readSortedHighScores()
displaySortedHighScores().
It calls the ViewManager.enableInfoView().
It terminates the process successfully System.exit(int).
Author:
Carolyn

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void displaySortedHighScores()
    Displays the sortedHighScoresList.txt contents into a JTextArea with a JScrollPane.
    Adds a JButton to the JTextArea to proceed to the "INFO" page with ViewManager.enableInfoView().
    Calls the readSortedHighScores()
    void mouseClicked​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Displays different views based on option chosen in HomeMenu.
    HomeMenu.getStartButton() ViewManager.enableGameBoard()
    HomeMenu.getInfoButton() ViewManager.enableInfoView()
    HomeMenu.getHighScoreButton() displaySortedHighScores()
    HomeMenu.getExitButton() System.exit(int)
    void mouseDragged​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void mouseEntered​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Paints a different view of the options in HomeMenu on entered and sets the boolean setters below to true.
    void mouseExited​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Paints the default view of the options in HomeMenu on exited and sets the boolean setters below to false.
    void mouseMoved​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Changes the cursor when mouse is moved into the outline area of the options in the HomeMenu.
    void mousePressed​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Paints a different view of the options in HomeMenu on pressed and sets the boolean setters below to true.
    void mouseReleased​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Paints the default view of the options in HomeMenu on released and sets the boolean setters below to false.
    private void readSortedHighScores()
    Reads the sortedHighScoresList.txt and stores its contents in an ArrayList of type String

    • displaySortedHighScores

      private void displaySortedHighScores()
      Displays the sortedHighScoresList.txt contents into a JTextArea with a JScrollPane.
      Adds a JButton to the JTextArea to proceed to the "INFO" page with ViewManager.enableInfoView().
      Calls the readSortedHighScores()
      See Also:
      JTextArea, JScrollPane, JButton, Window.dispose(), JFrame.remove(Component), JTextArea.append(String), ViewManager.initialise()
